import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get custom fields for asset"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/for/asset"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of custom fields applicable to an asset. This endpoint supports conditional custom fields through filter set matching.

**Request Body Behavior**:
- **Empty body `{}`**: Returns ALL custom fields defined for the Assets entity type, regardless of filter conditions.
- **With `EntityId`**: Returns only custom fields that either have no filter conditions OR whose filter conditions match the specified asset.
- **With `Entity` object**: Same as EntityId, but uses the provided asset properties for filter matching without a database lookup.
- **With `ForProductId`**: Overrides the product context from request headers.

**Filter Set Matching**:
Custom fields can have associated filter sets that control when they appear. For example, a "Warranty Expiration" field might only appear on assets with a specific AssetTypeId. When you provide an Entity or EntityId, the system evaluates these filter conditions and only returns matching fields.

**Prerequisites**:
- To filter by a specific asset, obtain the `AssetId` from [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets)

**Workflow Example**:
1. To get all asset custom fields: POST with empty body `{}`
2. To get custom fields for a specific asset: POST with `{"EntityId": "asset-uuid"}`
3. Use the returned `CustomFieldTypeId` values when setting custom field values via [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/values/for/assets](/docs/api/custom-fields/upsert-asset-custom-field-values)

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for retrieving custom fields applicable to an asset. When an Entity or EntityId is provided, the response is filtered to only include custom fields whose filter conditions match the specified asset. When neither is provided, all custom fields for the Assets entity type are returned.","properties":{"Entity":{"type":"object","description":"Full Asset object used for filter matching. When provided, the system evaluates custom field filter conditions against this object's properties (AssetTypeId, ModelId, LocationId, etc.) without requiring a database lookup. Either Entity or EntityId may be provided, but not both required.","properties":{"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the asset."},"AssetTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset type identifier used for filter matching."},"ModelId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Model identifier used for filter matching."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Location identifier used for filter matching."}}},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the asset to retrieve custom fields for. When provided without Entity, the system loads the asset from the database to evaluate filter conditions.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"}},"ForProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional product UUID to override the product context from request headers. Affects which product-specific custom fields are returned and how EntitySiteOption visibility is evaluated."}},"example":{"EntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3"},"title":"GetCustomFieldsForAssetRequest"},"examples":{"getAllFields":{"summary":"Get all asset custom fields","description":"Returns all custom fields for the Assets entity type without filtering","value":{}},"getByEntityId":{"summary":"Get fields for specific asset","description":"Returns custom fields filtered by the asset's properties","value":{"EntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3"}},"getWithProductOverride":{"summary":"Get fields with product context override","description":"Returns custom fields using a specific product context","value":{"EntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3","ForProductId":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
